title: Intermittent signalling issue on Circle Line

updates.text: [CCL] UPDATE: SMRT and LTA continue investigations on the CCL signalling issue. Read here for more details: https://t.co/CJcFODUfaL
[CCL] Due to ongoing tests,there will be no mobile signals at 4 stns: Kent Ridge, Haw Par Villa, Pasir Panjang & Labrador Pk from 7 to 9pm.
[CCL] Due to intermittent signalling issues, train may have longer dwell times at stations. Pls cater for longer travel time.
[CCL] Due to intermittent signalling issue, please cater for additional travel time on the CCL today.
